main event: A former German guided missile expert spotted a single white, pointed object moving from south to north at an altitude of approximately 14 kilometers, at a rather fast speed, with no sound or exhaust trail reported.
interesting points: The object was observed by the witness, a former German guided missile expert, in Berlin, Germany.
The object was described as a white, pointed object moving from south to north.
The object was observed at an altitude of approximately 14 kilometers and was traveling at a rather fast speed.
No sound or exhaust trail was reported from the object.
No photographs were available of the sighting.
witnesses: a former German guided missile expert
